data.text:
Lovely team, awesome breakfast. 
Well connected Hotel, near to the Cruises Port, metro and City Center. Breakfast is a must, the space is a bit tight but we enjoyed the food. We had a lovely room with a big bed.
data.title: Lovely team, awesome breakfast.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

First of all we would like to thank you for choosing our hotel, SERHS del Port, for your stay in Barcelona.

Thank you for the time you invested in this review, We celebrate that you had sucha good stay with us and you enjoyed our location and our breakfast.

There is only left to wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy new year.

Kind regards, 
Mireia C. 
Guest Relations Hotel SERHS del Port.
owner_response.author: Informació Hotel del Port

data.text: Great hotel. Staff was very helpful with everything we needed. We stayed for an entire week and we would have stayed another week without any hesitation. Breakfast was one of the best i've seen in a three stars hotel.  I will come back for sure!
data.title: Great hotel with an un unbeatable location!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
First of all, thank you for choosing our hotel, SERHS del Port, for your stay in Barcelona. Also thank you for the time invested in this review and the good score you have given us. We are very glad that you liked our hotel in general and that your stay was excellent. We appreciate your kind words towards our work team, as it is what continually motivates us. We hope to receive you again in the future.
Best regards, 
Malenna C., 
Guest Relations SERHS del Port.
owner_response.author: Informació Hotel del Port

data.text: The hotel is very good. The room was clean and it was warm and comfortable there. If necessary, basic hygiene products (shampoo, shower gel) and a hairdryer are provided. Located next to the metro station Paral·lel (easy to get to from the airport). A 10-minute walk to the main street - La Rambla. The staff is really friendly. Thanks a lot to them! I would also like to note that at the reception there is delicious water with various fruits. So I can definitely recommend this hotel.
data.title: Very good hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 
First of all, thank you very much for choosing the Hotel Serhs del Port for your stay in Barcelona and we appreciate your time taken to leave us your perfect review. We are happy to know that our hotel lived up to your expectations and that your stay was ideal, we are also happy to know that our reception staff was willing to help you with whatever you needed. On the other hand, we are happy to know that you enjoyed our water with fresh fruits. We hope to welcome you again in the future and give us the opportunity to repeat your pleasant stay. Kind regards, Malenna C., Guest relations Hotel SERHS del Port.
owner_response.author: Informació Hotel del Port

data.text: A fantastic little hotel located just five minutes from the cruise ship terminals. Staff was extremely friendly and breakfast was fantastic. We will be back for sure during our next visit to Barcelona.
data.title: Great experience

data.text: Stayed at the Hotel SERHS del Port for 4 nights while attending VMware Explore conference. First impressions was great, it was modern and very clean. Arrived at 10am but could not check in till 3pm but we could place our bags in the luggage room till later which was great. Room was spacious and clean. There was a complimentary bottle of water but no mini fridge which was only thing that let it down. My room was at the front looking onto the main road which was busy to early hours, so you may want to request room at the back if road noise bothers you. There was a wide range of options available for breakfast but it was 8am-10am, would have been great to start earlier as we needed to attend the conference by 9am. Hotel is in a great location as its next to Para-lel metro station and 5 minutes from La Ramblas. Hotel was also very secure as a room card was needed to get in or had to press buzzer for receptionist to open.
data.title: Clean, Modern and Great Location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 
First of all, thank you very much for choosing the Hotel Serhs del Port for your stay in Barcelona and we appreciate your time taken to leave us your excellent review. We are glad to know that our hotel lived up to your expectations and that your stay and hotel location were ideal for your work and leisure activities in the city. It also makes us happy to know that the details in the room and cleaning were to your liking and that you were able to rest comfortably in the room. On the other hand, we are sorry if the noise from the street interrupted your rest at any time, we are working on the issue of soundproofing to improve the quality of our clients. We hope to welcome you again in the future and give us the opportunity to continue improving. 
Kind regards, 
Malenna C., 
Customer Service at Hotel Serhs del Port.
owner_response.author: Informació Hotel del Port
